movie.title: Control
movie.plot: Control is the biography of Joy Division lead singer Ian Curtis, taking his story from schoolboy days of 1973 to his suicide on the eve of the band's first American tour in 1980.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 31 wins & 34 nominations.

events.title: Ian Curtis and Debbie Woodruff attend a Sex Pistols concert in Manchester
the band Warsaw, soon to be renamed to Joy Division, forms
Ian Curtis and Debbie Woodruff fight for the last time
Ian Curtis commits suicide at 23 years old
